GenomicED 0.1.0
  • Reference

Drosophila Melanogaster Tads borders indexed on chromosome 2R and 2L (F.Ramirez 2018, https://doi.org/10.1038/s41467-017-02525-w)

Source: R/domains_Border_Bin.gni.R
domains_Border_Bin.gni.Rd

Data from a HiC Seq experiment

Usage

data(domains_Border_Bin.gni)

Format

An object of class GInteractions.

Examples

data(domains_Border_Bin.gni)
domains_Border_Bin.gni
